!important;padding:0;width:100%;height:0;outline:none}.oo-player-container .oo-player:-moz-full-screen{position:absolute;width:100% !important;height:100% !important;padding:0 !important}.oo-player-container .oo-player:-webkit-full-screen{width:100% !important;height:100% !important;padding:0 !important}.oo-player-container .oo-player:-ms-fullscreen{width:100% !important;height:100% !important;padding:0 !important}.oo-player-container .oo-player.oo-fullscreen{position:fixed;overflow:hidden;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%}.oo-player-container .oo-video-player{padding-top:56.25%}.oo-player-container .oo-player-skin{overflow:hidden;z-index:11000}@-moz-document url-prefix(){.oo-player-container .oo-anamorphic video{object-fit:fill !important}}.oo-player-container .oo-blur{-webkit-filter:blur(3px);-moz-filter:blur(3px);filter:blur(3px)}.oo-player-container .oo-z-index-auto{z-index:auto !important}.oo-player-container .oo-audio-only{padding:12px}
